dublin_core.dcvalue: Interreality is a personalized immersive e therapy whose main novelty is a hybrid closed loop empowering experience bridging physical and virtual worlds The main feature of interreality is a twofold link between the virtual and the real world a behavior in the physical world influences the experience in the virtual one b behavior in the virtual world influences the experience in the real one This is achieved through 1 3D Shared Virtual Worlds role playing experiences in which one or more users interact with one another within a 3D world 2 Bio and Activity Sensors From the Real to the Virtual World They are used to track the emotional health activity status of the user and to influence his her experience in the virtual world aspect activity and access 3 Mobile Internet Appliances From the Virtual to the Real One In interreality the social and individual user activity in the virtual world has a direct link with the users life through a mobile phone digital assistant The different technologies that are involved in the interreality vision and its clinical rationale are addressed and discussed
